chapters.title: Chapter 13:  High Seats
chapters.info: Lord Conail Northan, p. 328 (389)—High Seat of House Northan. He is tall and lean, has bony arms, an engaging grin, merry brown eyes, and an eagle's beak of a nose. He is not much older than sixteen. He thinks Arymilla is incompetant, and pledged the support of his House to Elayne.
